comments.text:
I would like a "topsrcleaf" variable that lets me use the leaf name of my tree (e.g. "tracemonkey") as part of the build directory name.

Rationale:
* I want to index my trees but not my builds. Spotlight only excludes dirs.
* I want to back up my trees but not my builds. Time Machine only excludes dirs.
* When I update XCode or MozillaBuild, I need to blow away all my objdirs.

I frequently create and destroy trees, so it is infeasiable to maintain separate mozconfigs or OS settings for each tree.
